title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2021 that focus on parsing in the context of natural language processing (NLP
note: with an emphasis on unsupervised approaches and their applications:

title: These articles cover a range of techniques and approaches to unsupervised parsing, from grammar induction to dependency parsing, and their applications in various NLP tasks
